attributes.action: allow an "opt out" of National Insurance contributions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more we hear of people who are suffering medically and the government will not fund the treatment as it is deemed too expensive.
If given a choice, many would opt out of national insurance contributions and opt into private medical insurance and be certain that whatever their medical condition , he /she will be entitled to treatment.
